message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, as you know it's worth a lot more to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, which is still a great value for you considering the product's worth. Let's find a middle ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $9,000 for the product.
